text: A khto z vas ne maye nalezhnoho statku, shchob odruzhytysya na viruyuchykh tsnotlyvykh zhinkakh, toy nekhay odruzhuyetʹsya na viruyuchykh zhinkakh z-posered zakhoplenykh vamy u polon. Allah krashche znaye pro viru vashu, i vsi vy — odne vid odnoho. Tozh odruzhuytesʹ iz nymy z dozvolu yikhnikh rodyn, i davayte yim vynahorodu yikhnyu za zvychayem, shchob vony buly tsnotlyvymy, a ne rozpusnytsyamy chy tymy, yaki mayutʹ potayemnykh pryyateliv. Yakshcho zh pislya odruzhennya vony skoyatʹ rozpustu, to pokarannya dlya nykh — polovyna pokarannya dlya vilʹnykh zhinok. Odruzhennya z nevilʹnytsyamy dozvolene tym iz vas, khto boyitʹsya hrikha perelyubu. I yakshcho vy budete terpity, to tse bude krashche dlya vas. Allah — Proshchayuchyy, Myloserdnyy
